name: Imperial Armor Package
desc: A suite of defensive modifications emphasizing resilience and reliability.
short: Increases armor and weapon durability at the cost of maneuverability. Improves ship system.

name: Imperial Targeting Package
desc: A suite of gunnery modifications emphasizing operational range and firepower.
short: Increases weapon range and accuracy at the cost of projectile speed/turning. Improves ship system.

name: Imperial Elite Package
desc: A suite of aggressive modifications emphasizing "live fast, die hard" combat philosophy.
short: Improves speed and offensive characteristics at the cost of range and longevity. Improves ship system.
sModDesc: Increases the ship's deployment points and supply cost to recover from deployment by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size.

name: Imperial Core Upgrades
desc: A special enhancement suite emphasizing core Imperium combat doctrine.

name: Reinforced Emplacements
desc: Increases weapon durability by %s and boosts projectile weapon range by %s, but slows turret traversal by %s.
short: Increases weapon range and durability. Decreases turret turn rate.

name: Planetary Bombardment
desc:
Designed to pummel a planet's structures and industries into submission from high orbit. Capable of sundering worlds and eradicating populations with horrendous ease. Increases the effective strength of planetary raids by %s, up to the total number of marines in the fleet. Reduces the fuel cost of a bombardment operation by %s units.

Deployment points are %s lower than standard, due to the bulk of the ship's capability being taken up by the Titan, which is launched shortly after deployment.
short: Improves effectiveness of raids. Greatly reduces fuel cost of bombardment. Permits eradication of markets.

name: Imperial Training
desc: This ship's officers and crew are trained for the rigors of combat. Takes %s fewer crew casualties from hull damage sustained in combat. Increases the effective strength of planetary raids by %s (%s of the ship's base crew), up to the total number of marines in the fleet.
short: Reduces crew casualties, improves effectiveness of raids.

name: Attraction Matrix
desc: Distracts the guidance systems of incoming missiles.
short: Distracts the guidance systems of incoming missiles.

name: Moderately Extended Shields
desc: Increases the shield's coverage by %s degrees.

name: Tachyon Comm Booster
desc: Increases the engagement range of deployed fighters by %s.
short: Increases the engagement range of deployed fighters.

name: HULLMOD CONFLICT
desc: %s: the hullmod you tried to install conflicts with this hull or another previously installed hullmod.
